meanings.sent1: She henpecks her husband about leaving his socks on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The boss henpecks the employees about meeting deadlines.
meanings.sent3: The parrot henpecks the other birds in the cage, mimicking their squawks.
meanings.sent4: The storm henpecks the coastline, eroding the cliffs over time.
meanings.sent5: The dripping faucet henpecks my sanity, the constant sound driving me crazy.

meanings.definition: A woman who nags or criticizes constantly
meanings.sent1: The henpecks in the neighborhood always have something to complain about.
meanings.sent2: My aunt is known as the family henpecks, always finding faults in everything.
meanings.sent3: The henpecks at the office make sure everyone knows their opinions, whether wanted or not.
meanings.sent4: The henpecks of the henhouse keep the other hens in line with their constant clucking.
meanings.sent5: The henpecks in the henhouse rule with their sharp beaks and sharp tongues.
